ComicInfo.Summary: The Top Cow Universe irrevocably changed by the event of ARTIFACTS #13, and while the event is over, the story continues. Tom Judge, bearer of the Rapture, can't get the feeling out of his head that something is horribly wrong... with everything. The longtime WITCHBLADE team of RON MARZ (MAGDALENA, SHINKU) and STJEPAN SEJIC (ANGELUS) reunite to tell the ongoing saga of the Top Cow Universe itself.
ComicInfo.Title: New Creation, Part 1; Reborn
ComicInfo.Characters: Necromancer,Jenny Romano,Ian Nottingham,Danielle Baptiste,Glorianna Silver,Sara Pezzini,Magdalena,Alina Enstrom,Sabine,Ji Xi,Hope Pezzini,Witchblade,The Angelus,Aphrodite IV,Detective Gleason,Tilly Grimes,Doctor Rachel Harrison,Jackie Estacado,Tom Judge,Michael Finnegan
